description: Gets the headers for an object at the specified path.

parameters.name: Path
parameters.description: The path (including the file name) where the object is stored in the container. Format: <folder name>/<folder name>/<file name>

nested_items.name: ETag
nested_items.description: The ETag that represents a unique instance of the object.

nested_items.name: ContentType
nested_items.description: The content type of the object.

nested_items.name: ContentLength
nested_items.description: The length of the object in bytes.

nested_items.name: CacheControl
nested_items.description: An optional CacheControl header that allows the caller to control the object's cache behavior. Headers can be passed in as specified in the HTTP at https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec14.html#sec14.9.

nested_items.name: LastModified
nested_items.description: The date and time that the object was last modified.
